channel.title: Homes on Fan Lyu
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Fan Lyu

item.description: I am currently a Postdoctoral Research Fellow in the New Laboratory of Pattern Recognition (NLPR) at the Institute of Automation, Chinese Academy of Sciences (CASIA), under the supervision of Prof. Liang Wang. I completed my PhD at the College of Intelligence and Computing, Tianjin University (TJU), where I was advised by Prof. Wei Feng. Prior to that, I graduated with a masterâ€™s degree from Suzhou University of Science and Technology in 2018, under the guidance of Prof.
